EN copy:

低至HKD730起

2. HKD730 valid on BR828/858/810
3. HKD830 valid on BR852/868/870

EN copy: ENJOY 20% OFF ON DINE-IN AT MAYFARE RESTAURANTS
ZH copy: 於Mayfare Restaurants 可享堂食8折優惠
EN T&Cs:
For dine-in only
Cannot be exchanged for cash
Only valid with bill settlements by credit cards
Cannot be used in conjunction with other offers or discounts
Present Zalora Hong Kong purchase receipt (mobile or printed version) issued before 31 July 2017 upon placing order
Not valid on festive dates (i.e. 3/5, 14/5, 30/5, 18/6, 1/7)
Valid until 31st July 2017.
Mayfare Group reserves the right of final decision in case of any dispute
ZH T&Cs:
適用於堂食
不可兌換現金
只適用於以信用卡結賬
不可與其他優惠並用
須出示於2017年7月31日 前發出的 Zalora 購物單據 （電子或印刷版）方可享用此優惠
不適用於節日 （即5月3日，5月14 日，5月30日，6月18日，7月1日）
有效期至2017年7月31日。
如有任何爭議 ，Mayfare Group保留對此優惠之最終決定權

EN copy: 2 of reenex Neo-collagen treatment Free Trial (valued at HK$2,480)
ZH copy: 2大皇牌reenex膠原自生療程(總值 HK$2,480)
EN T&Cs:
1.Offer is only applicable to new female customers of reenex aged 18 or above.
2.The trial will be carried out at reenex centres in Hong Kong. Advance registration and reservation are required to enjoy the offer.
3.Please present your Hong Kong/ Macau/ PRC ID card for verification and registration prior to the treatment.
4.Please be punctual or call (852)2972 0388 at least 24 hours prior to the treatment to reschedule the appointment.
5.In case of disputes, reenex reserves the right of final decision relating to these Terms and Conditions.
ZH T&Cs:
1.優惠只適用於年滿18歲並首次試用reenex之女性客戶。
2.此優惠療程將安排於香港reenex分店進行。享用優惠時必須預先登記及預約時間。
3.參加者於享用療程前，必須出示香港身份證/澳門居民身份證/中國居民身份證及記錄。
4.參加者必須準時出席，如需要更改療程時間，請於24小時前致電(852)2972 0388。
5.如有任何爭議，reenex膠原自生中心保留一切與本條款及細則有關的最終決定權。

EN copy: Special offer $138 to enjoy “Underarm Unlimited Hair Removal Package
EN T&Cs:
1.This offer is only applicable to new customers.
2.Prior appointment for skin care consultation is required.
3.This offer can be used once for each person.
4. Our customer representative will be following the service booking after the enrollment.
5.This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other promotional offers and cannot be refund.
6. Service provided by Musee Platinum Tokyo and Musee Medical Beauty Centre. For details, please call Musee Platinum Tokyo at 2169 – 4888 or Musee Medical Beauty Centre at 2169 – 4848.
7. MUSEE PLATINUM TOKYO and Musee Medical Beauty Centre reserves the right of final decision in case of any dispute.
8. Promotion period till 30 Jun 2017.
ZH T&Cs:
1. 以上優惠只適用於新客戶。
2. 療程前，必須先致電熱線預約諮詢進行皮膚分析。
3. 以上優惠每人限用1次。
4. 成功登記後，將有專人致電通知預約時間。
5. 以上優惠不可與其他優惠同時使用及不設退款。
6. 服務由Musee Platinum Tokyo 及Musee Medical Beauty Centre提供；如有任何優惠查詢，請直接聯絡Musee Platinum Tokyo : 2169 – 4888 或 Musee Medical Beauty Centre : 2169 – 4848。
7. 如有任何爭議，Musee Platinum Tokyo 及Musee Medical Beauty Centre 保留此優惠最終決定權。
8. 優惠期至2017年6月30日

EN copy:
Deliver Anything Locally within 1 Hour!
Lalamove connects you with the best delivery drivers nearby. Deliver faster with less hassle.

Lalamove 送嘢拿拿聲!
立即登記體驗更快、更好、更易的運送服務！
使用優惠代碼“LALAZALORA“，即享獨家$20折扣優惠！

1. Enter this code to enjoy the special discount when placing an order.
2. Not in conjunction with any other offer.
3. This offer is only valid for first-time users.
4. Code "LALAZALORA" valid from now until 30 June 2017.
5. For enquires, please contact us at (852) 3701 3701.

2. 不可與其他優惠同時使用。
3. 只適用於首次用戶。

5. 如有任何查詢，歡迎致電 (852) 3701 3701。
6. 如有任何爭議，Lalamove將保留最終決定權。

EN copy:
Enjoy Embroidery!
Sign up as Brothership new member to get HK$100 coupon to shop at Brother eShop!
ZH copy:
Brother家用縫紉繡花機，讓你把心愛的圖案添加到布料上。
現登記成為Brothership新會員，即可獲得Brother eShop HK$100優惠券！
EN T&Cs:
1.The promotion period is from 1st Jun to 31th Jul 2017 (HKT).
2.The promotion is only available to Hong Kong residents.
3.The HK$100 e-coupon bonus is only available who successfully enroll as a new Brothership member.
4. Each Eligible New Brothership Member will be entitled to the HK$100 coupon once only.
5.Brother reserves the right to alter or terminate the promotion and amend the terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Other Brother terms and conditions apply.
6.All matters or disputes will be subject to the final decision of Brother International (HK) Limited.
ZH T&Cs:
1.推廣期由香港時間 (GMT +8) 2017年6月1日至7月31日。
2.此推廣只適用於香港居民。
3.Brother HK$100優惠券迎新獎賞只適用於成功登記成為Brothership新會員。
4.每位合資格「Brothership」新會員只可獲享迎新獎賞一次。
5.Brother保留隨時更改或終止推廣優惠，以及修改所述任何條款及細則之權利。Brother International (HK) Limited其他條款及細則適用。
6.如有任何爭議，Brother International (HK) Limited保留最終決定權。

EN copy:
Book your next meal with BigDish!
Enjoy up to 50% off your bill and get a ZALORA $100 voucher!
ZH copy: 用BigDish訂位食飯，埋單即享高達半價優惠以及ZALORA $100優惠卷！
EN T&Cs:
1. Promotion ends on 15/8/2017
2. Valid for a minimum reservation of 2 pax
3. Only one Promo Code may be used at a time
4. The Promo code may be used on bigdish.hk only and must be entered upon booking to be effective.
5. To receive a Promo Code, you have to make a booking before 15/8/2017.
6. BigDish reserves the right to amend these terms and condition or to cancel the
Promo Code at any time
7. Email containing promo code will be sent you within 3 days
8. ZALORA voucher will be valid until 31/8/2017
ZH T&Cs:
1. 優惠期限至2017年8月15號
2. 訂座人數最少兩位起先可獲得推廣碼
3. 用餐後方可獲得一個推廣碼
4. 此推廣碼只適用於bigdish.hk及BigDish手機應用程式，並須於訂位期間輸入方可生效
5. 必須在2017年8月15日前完成訂位方可獲取推廣碼
6. BigDish Hong Kong 保留隨時修改條款或終止此推廣碼的權利
7. 推廣碼將會在三個工作天內以電郵方式寄出
8. ZALORA 優惠劵期限至2017年8月31日

EN copy: Spacious offers you tons of high quality listings in Hong Kong with a simple-to-use platform.
ZH copy: 在方便易用的Spacious千居平台，尋找全港各區優質樓盤。

EN copy: Enjoy Himalayan Salt Stone Massage, Facial Massage and Eye Treatment with special offer HKD288. (Total Value: HKD1,300)
ZH copy: 以優惠價HKD288盡享三項療程，包括：獨家岩鹽熱石身體按摩、皇牌Miris Spa Facial Massage面部護理及眼部亮澤水漾護理。(總值：HKD1,300)
EN T&Cs:
1. Only valid for first-time visit female customers aged 18 or above or old female customers who have not use our service for 6 months
2. Each customer can enjoy the above promotional offer once only
3. Only valid for Hong Kong residents
4. Miris Spa has four branches: Tsim Sha Tsui, Causeway Bay, Mong Kok, Tsuen Wan.
5. For any enquiry or booking, please contact Miris Spa at (852)68400488
6. All matters or disputes will be subject to the final decision of Miris Spa
ZH T&Cs:
1. 優惠只適用於年滿18歲或以上之女性新客戶或6個月以上未有使用服務之舊客戶。
2. 每人只限體驗以上優惠一次。
3. 優惠只適用於持有效身份証的香港居民。
4. 可選擇在以下分店進行療程：尖沙咀、銅鑼灣、旺角、荃灣。
5. 查詢或預約請致電(852)68400488。
6. 如有任何爭議，Miris Spa保留最終決定權。
